Mr Stephen Elop said the world's biggest mobile operators were ''all smiles'' about the tie-up because Nokia has traditionally been more amiable to telecoms providers than Apple or Google. This is good news for operators, he said. ''We are in a position to create a third ecosystem. We know what it means to be the most friendly to the operators.''
